title: Mphasis to double presence in UK with innovation hub for quantum expertise
description: Mphasis said in a regulatory filing that it has expanded its UK presence over the past years and looks to double the headcount over the next three years through the London innovation hub. While the exact headcount in UK was uncertain, Mphasis employed a total workforce at 31,645 as of June end, down by 1,019 employees from the March quarter.
content: Mid-tier software services provider on Tuesday announced plans to double its presence in the UK as it established a London innovation hub to leverage the transformative power of Quantum technologies.
